00019 #ifndef _POSIX_INTERNAL_H
00020 #define _POSIX_INTERNAL_H
00021 
00022 #include <nucleus/xenomai.h>
00023 #include <nucleus/core.h>
00024 #include <nucleus/ppd.h>
00025 #include <posix/posix.h>
00026 #include <posix/registry.h>
00027 
00028 #define PSE51_MAGIC(n) (0x8686##n##n)
00029 #define PSE51_ANY_MAGIC         PSE51_MAGIC(00)
00030 #define PSE51_THREAD_MAGIC      PSE51_MAGIC(01)
00031 #define PSE51_THREAD_ATTR_MAGIC PSE51_MAGIC(02)
00032 #define PSE51_MUTEX_MAGIC       PSE51_MAGIC(03)
00033 #define PSE51_MUTEX_ATTR_MAGIC  (PSE51_MAGIC(04) & ((1 << 24) - 1))
00034 #define PSE51_COND_MAGIC        PSE51_MAGIC(05)
00035 #define PSE51_COND_ATTR_MAGIC   (PSE51_MAGIC(05) & ((1 << 24) - 1))
00036 #define PSE51_SEM_MAGIC         PSE51_MAGIC(06)
00037 #define PSE51_KEY_MAGIC         PSE51_MAGIC(07)
00038 #define PSE51_ONCE_MAGIC        PSE51_MAGIC(08)
00039 #define PSE51_MQ_MAGIC          PSE51_MAGIC(09)
00040 #define PSE51_MQD_MAGIC         PSE51_MAGIC(0A)
00041 #define PSE51_INTR_MAGIC        PSE51_MAGIC(0B)
00042 #define PSE51_NAMED_SEM_MAGIC   PSE51_MAGIC(0C)
00043 #define PSE51_TIMER_MAGIC       PSE51_MAGIC(0D)
00044 #define PSE51_SHM_MAGIC         PSE51_MAGIC(0E)
00045 
00046 #define PSE51_MIN_PRIORITY      XNCORE_LOW_PRIO
00047 #define PSE51_MAX_PRIORITY      XNCORE_HIGH_PRIO
00048 
00049 #define ONE_BILLION             1000000000
00050 
00051 #define pse51_obj_active(h,m,t) \
00052         ((h) && ((t *)(h))->magic == (m))
00053 
00054 #define pse51_obj_deleted(h,m,t) \
00055         ((h) && ((t *)(h))->magic == ~(m))
00056 
00057 #define pse51_mark_deleted(t) ((t)->magic = ~(t)->magic)
00058 
00059 typedef struct {
00060         xnqueue_t condq;
00061         xnqueue_t intrq;
00062         xnqueue_t mutexq;
00063         xnqueue_t semq;
00064         xnqueue_t threadq;
00065         xnqueue_t timerq;
00066 } pse51_kqueues_t;
00067 
00068 #if defined(__KERNEL__) && defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE)
00069 typedef struct {
00070         pse51_kqueues_t kqueues;
00071         pse51_assocq_t uqds;
00072         pse51_assocq_t usems;
00073         pse51_assocq_t umaps;
00074         pse51_assocq_t ufds;
00075 
00076         xnshadow_ppd_t ppd;
00077 
00078 #define ppd2queues(addr)                                                        \
00079         ((pse51_queues_t *) ((char *) (addr) - offsetof(pse51_queues_t, ppd)))
00080 
00081 } pse51_queues_t;
00082 
00083 extern int pse51_muxid;
00084 #endif /* __KERNEL__ && CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
00085 
00086 extern pse51_kqueues_t pse51_global_kqueues;
00087 
00088 #if defined(__KERNEL__) && defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE)
00089 static inline pse51_queues_t *pse51_queues(void)
00090 {
00091         xnshadow_ppd_t *ppd;
00092         spl_t s;
00093 
00094         xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, s);
00095 
00096         ppd = xnshadow_ppd_get(pse51_muxid);
00097         
00098         xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, s);
00099 
00100         if (!ppd)
00101                 return NULL;
00102 
00103         return ppd2queues(ppd);
00104 }
00105 #endif /* __KERNEL__ && CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
00106 
00107 static inline pse51_kqueues_t *pse51_kqueues(int pshared)
00108 {
00109 #if defined(__KERNEL__) && defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE)
00110         xnshadow_ppd_t *ppd;
00111 
00112         if (pshared || !(ppd = xnshadow_ppd_get(pse51_muxid)))
00113                 return &pse51_global_kqueues;
00114 
00115         return &ppd2queues(ppd)->kqueues;
00116 #else /* !__KERNEL__ || !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
00117         return &pse51_global_kqueues;
00118 #endif /* !__KERNEL__ || !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
00119 }
00120 
00121 static inline void ticks2ts(struct timespec *ts, xnticks_t ticks)
00122 {
00123     ts->tv_sec = xnarch_uldivrem(xnpod_ticks2ns(ticks),
00124                                  ONE_BILLION,
00125                                  &ts->tv_nsec);
00126 }
00127 
00128 static inline xnticks_t ts2ticks_floor(const struct timespec *ts)
00129 {
00130     xntime_t nsecs = ts->tv_nsec;
00131     if(ts->tv_sec)
00132         nsecs += (xntime_t) ts->tv_sec * ONE_BILLION;
00133     return xnpod_ns2ticks(nsecs);
00134 }
00135 
00136 static inline xnticks_t ts2ticks_ceil(const struct timespec *ts)
00137 {
00138     xntime_t nsecs = ts->tv_nsec;
00139     unsigned long rem;
00140     xnticks_t ticks;
00141     if(ts->tv_sec)
00142         nsecs += (xntime_t) ts->tv_sec * ONE_BILLION;
00143     ticks = xnarch_ulldiv(nsecs, xnpod_get_tickval(), &rem);
00144     return rem ? ticks+1 : ticks;
00145 }
00146 
00147 static inline xnticks_t clock_get_ticks(clockid_t clock_id)
00148 {
00149     if(clock_id == CLOCK_REALTIME)
00150         return xnpod_get_time();
00151     else
00152         return xnpod_ns2ticks(xnpod_get_cpu_time());
00153 }
00154 
00155 /* Convert an absolute timeout for clock clock_id to a relative timeout. */
00156 static inline int clock_adjust_timeout(xnticks_t *timeoutp, clockid_t clock_id)
00157 {
00158     xnsticks_t delay;
00159 
00160     if(*timeoutp == XN_INFINITE)
00161         return 0;
00162 
00163     delay = *timeoutp - clock_get_ticks(clock_id);
00164     if(delay <= 0)
00165         return ETIMEDOUT;
00166 
00167     *timeoutp = delay;
00168     return 0;
00169 }
00170 
00171 #endif /* !_POSIX_INTERNAL_H */
